text.config.gravity-pads.title: Gravity Pads Config
text.config.gravity-pads.option.antiSoft:
When you go too high, the anti-softlock will trigger
preventing you from going up forever

Disabling this is NOT recommended for Survival play.

Save as the vertical one, only that you can 
maneuver around a bit and reach some ground manually.
Enabling this is optional

At this many blocks above world height limit
the vertical softlock should trigger.

For example, normally world height is Y=320 and this value's default is 64,
thus the anti-softlock will activate at Y=384

Negative numbers are allowed for height LOWER than
the world height. Setting this to a very low number
disables the pad from going upwards
completely but might be buggy
